Why Farmer Bob's?

My dogs have lived all their life on kibble. So why would they need real food?

There’s a big difference between surviving and thriving. Kibbles are used to feed your dog economically, but are also the cause of many health issues. It won’t take long for you to see the difference. Most of our customers report a shinier coat, reduced odour and improved vitality within weeks!

How tailor-made fresh food will change your dog’s life

Each unique meal plan we create is 100% complete and balanced. We never add in artificial colourings or flavours but add essential nutrients (like vitamins and minerals) where required to ensure a complete and optimised food. We use a wide range of natural wholefoods and high quality ingredients, each with different nutritional benefits. A genuinely fresh and wholesome diet provides optimised nutrition, meaning a happier and healthier life for your dog.

Discover the nutritional benefits of our food

  • Healthier teeth & gums Chewing on dried chews is the equivalent of a good brushing and flossing for dogs. This helps break down tartar and reduces the risk of gum disease. Find them in our supplements section!
  • Vibrant skin & coat Natural omega-3 fatty acids can improve the coat and skin tone
  • Improved digestion Real muscle meat and organs provide proteolytic enzymes necessary to absorb the nutrients they need. Reduced stool volume and odor is a sign of an improved and healthy digestion cycle.
  • Stronger immune system Fresh foods provide a good balance of essential fatty acids and nutrients that help build resistance to diseases, reduce inflammatory conditions and eliminate infections.
  • Leaner body mass Dogs absorb more proteins and nutrients they need from whole foods and tend to be more lean, solid and muscular than kibble fed dogs.
  • Increased energy & stamina Real muscle and organ meat contain essential amino acids that help build muscle, store energy and boost stamina and promote endurance.

Regular dog food

Conventional cans and dry feeds mostly consist of animal by-products, slaughter waste, artificial additives and chemicals. This creates a compromise in the nutrition and results in inferior quality food. In addition, the low moisture content in conventional dry fodder is a burden on the kidneys of the animal.

Our food

Our meals are freshly made from natural, wholesome, human-grade ingredients, full of pure muscle meat, fruits and veggies and contain nothing artificial. We formulated our food to provide the best nutrition for your dog’s needs.

Never run out again

We know when you're close to running out so we'll automatically deliver more, straight to your door. You don't have to be at home for the delivery - you can nominate a safe place for the delivery to be left. No more heavy bags to bring home from the shops. You can pause, delay or cancel your regular deliveries at any time, so you're always in control. And we'll always let you know via email when we're about to prepare your next delivery.
